title: Database Management, Migration, and Integration
summary: Best practices and configuration patterns for managing databases (PostgreSQL and MySQL) on cloud platforms like Vercel, Supabase, and Railway. Documents the 'Trusted Admin Pattern' using Next.js Server Actions and 'server-only' guards for secure administrative CUD operations. Includes comprehensive API key troubleshooting for identifying JWT formats vs. internal secret identifiers. Covers environment variable management, extraction strategies from local .env, and production deployment workflows for monorepos. Key technical optimizations include 'max: 1' and 'prepare: false' settings for Supabase Session Pooler compatibility. Documents the SQL Bridge Pattern, the Universal Node.js Migration Runner, and Schema Completeness Auditing as reliable strategies for legacy data preservation.
